cells.data: -- filePathTree :: filePath -> [Tree String] -> Tree filePathon filePathTree(fpAnchor, trees)	script go		on |λ|(fp)			script				on |λ|(tree)					set strPath to fp & "/" & (root of tree)										Node(strPath, map(go's |λ|(strPath), nest of tree))				end |λ|			end script		end |λ|	end script		Node(fpAnchor, map(go's |λ|(fpAnchor), trees))end filePathTree
